about_the_game:
"The prestige you deserve."

The first-class private lounge is now open to anyone who has the "PRESTIGE PASS".
Open 24/7, top-notch artists are just waiting for you to join them and experience all the beauties they have to offer.
Members are gathering in the main hall. Looks like the show is just about to start.
So, what are you waiting for?


This DLC includes the following contents :

Songs

▣ 1. Stay 2022 | by Jeon Jun Kyu & Scott Mac
▣ 2. Belong To You | by Jeon Jun Kyu
▣ 3. R.F.C. II | by ND Lee
▣ 4. Over Drying | by M2U
▣ 5. Iron Cloud | by r300k
▣ 6. 開花 | by Memme
▣ 7. Glacial Alice | by ATAS
▣ 8. ATOPY | by SANY-ON
▣ 9. Backfire | by Roy Mikelate (feat. Sobrem)
▣ 10. TakeOFF | by A1NVERSE
▣ 11. Kings | by AmamoriP
▣ 12. LIGHTYEAR | by Zekk
▣ 13. kthnox | by Sobrem
▣ 14. A Showdown Between Two Prideful Geniuses | by EmoCosine vs. RiraN
▣ 15. Go Back | by Planetboom (feat. Miya)
▣ 16. Sakura Garden | by M2U x Pica
▣ 17. 별처럼 (Stella) | by NieN (feat. Lee Ji Ae)
▣ 18. Next Endeavour | by Orvalism
▣ 19. Various Ways | by Yamajet
▣ 20. Start Me Up | by Tatsh
▣ 21. MAX301 | by NAOKI underground -Ω-
▣ 22. Unleashed Emotions | by TAG
▣ 23. felys -final remix- | by onoken
▣ 24. TRPNO | by Nauts
▣ 25. Higher | by ND Lee
▣ 26. 個人的なメモ (KENPO SAITO) | by ASLETICS x Zpinkpong
▣ 27. TROMA | by Planetboom
▣ 28. coastline | by iMp
▣ 29. Faker | by Sigma X3
▣ 30. Nobody Face Love | by RiraN
▣ 31. LIMBO | by Mori†
▣ 32. FiND A WAY | by REDALiCE
▣ 33. 다 잘될 거야 (Almost There) | by TAK (feat. 95jack)
▣ 34. Decision Altitude | by A1NVERSE
▣ 35. ROD7 -Regions Of Desolation- | by NieN
▣ 36. JUSTITIA | by Cosmograph vs. Lunatic Sounds (feat. NieN)
▣ 37. Glimmering | by ARForest
▣ 38. Cybernetic Geist | by KARUT
▣ 39. Diabolic Swing | by t+pazolite
▣ 40. 2038 (2022 Version) | by Yamajet
▣ 41. ozma | by TJ.hangneil

Skins

- "PRESTIGE PASS" Exclusive System Theme

- "PRESTIGE INGOT", "PRESTIGE CHIP" Note Skin
- "Kings" Panel skin / Judge skin / Combo skin
- "Various Ways" Panel skin / Judge skin / Combo skin
- "FiND A WAY" Panel skin / Judge skin / Combo skin
- "DOOMS" Note skin
- "NIGHTFALL" Panel Skin

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-530 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® UHD Graphics 620 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
